characters.story: "TUNG?" the horse questions curiously - to take flight, soar, and rise?
The stone bends down drooping - a numeral, number, and digit.
"SHYOON?" the horse and stream question curiously - tame, to domesticate and train?
The jewel and horse bend down drooping - Mary, name, and gemstone.
"JOO!" the horse commands sharply - to be stationed, deploy, and guard the post!
"JYAO!" the horse and angel sing cheerfully - arrogant, proud, and haughty!
"CHIH?" the horse questions curiously - to gallop, race, and become famous?
"MAH!" the insect and horse command sharply - leech-hopper, ant, and grasshopper - black!
"PING?" the heart questions curiously - proof, evidence, and basis for arrest?
The horse bends down drooping - to maneuver, navigate with broken brain.
"SAO!" the horse sings cheerfully - to disturb, harass, and trouble!
"JYAH!" the horse commands sharply - to drive, pilot, and control!
"LWOH?" the horse and tired question curiously - a mule, hybrid donkey?
"BWOH?" the horse and two sheaves question curiously - to refute, dispute, and contradict?
The gate bends down drooping - to rush, burst, and intrude into the house!
"CHYOO!" the horse sings cheerfully - to drive away, expel, and chase!
"PYEN!" the horse commands sharply - to cheat, deceive, and swindle!
"JOH!" the horse commands sharply - to trot, gallop suddenly!
